content: निज् {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> (नेनेक्ति, नेनिक्ते, प्रणेनेक्ति, निक्त) {@--1@} To wash, cleanse, purify; सस्नुः पयः पपुरनेनिजुरंबराणि <ls>Śi. 5. 28.</ls> {@--2@} To wash or clean oneself, to be purified (<ab>A.</ab>). {@--3@} To nourish. WITH निस् to wash, clean, purify; <ls>R. 17. 22</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 191</ls>; <ls>Ms. 5. 127.</ls>
